extension_description.message: 用快捷鍵瀏覽谷歌的搜尋結果

doc_title_settings.description: Title of the extension's options page.

shortcuts.description: A tab button name in options page.

other_settings.description: A tab button name in options page.

style_preview.description: Text of selected search result style preview.

left_line_style.description: Text of selected search result style.

dotted_rect_style.description: Text of selected search result style.

rgb_style.description: Text of selected search result style.

reset_all.message: 重置所有設定，包含快捷鍵
reset_all.description: The description of reset all button in other settings.

confirm_reset_all.message: 確定要重置所有設定（包含快捷鍵）嗎？
confirm_reset_all.description: The message shown in the confirmation dialog.

debug_checkbox.message: 啟用偵錯模式（印於控制台）
debug_checkbox.description: The description of reset all button in other settings.

how_to_use.description: A tab button name in options page.

how_to_use_content.message: 在谷歌搜尋結果頁面按下快捷鍵。
how_to_use_content.description: The description of how to use.

about.description: A tab button name in options page.

about_content.message: 我熱愛 vim 的快捷鍵，然而谷歌搜尋本身沒有這個功能，因此我自己撰寫了這個擴充功能圓夢。不過我最近發現谷歌在隱私這塊很糟糕，所以我改用 SearXNG、DuckDuckGO、StartPage，結果 SearXNG 跟 DuckDuckGo 早就有類似的功能了。

upward.description: The shortcut description for options page.

downward.description: The shortcut description for options page.

open_in_current_tab.description: The shortcut description for options page.

open_in_new_tab_but_stay_on_current.description: The shortcut description for options page.

open_in_new_tab_and_focus.description: The shortcut description for options page.

go_to_search_box.description: The shortcut description for options page.

go_to_search_box_and_select_text.description: The shortcut description for options page.

focus_on_result_type_tabs.description: The shortcut description for options page.

error_while_saving.message: 儲存時發生錯誤，查看控制台獲得更多訊息。
error_while_saving.description: The alert message shown when error occurs while saving.
